roleset.name: move in a small, fast increment
roleset.note: BLIP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Newswire, comparison to rise-v.01. No VNcls. (from blip.01-v)

example.name: blip-v: Just arg1, plus some argMs
example.text: Nevertheless , said Brenda Malizia Negus , editor of Money Fund Report , yields `` may blip up again before they blip down '' because of recent rises in short - term interest rates .
example.arg: "because of recent rises in short-term interest rates
